title: Neil Gray – 2022 Comments on the Language Used by Suella Braverman
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Neil Gray, the SNP MSP for Airdrie and Shotts, on Twitter on 1 November 2022.
content:
One of the most shameful, inflammatory & dangerous statements I have seen from any politician purporting to represent a mainstream party. This othering is despicable & seeks to defect from Braverman’s own troubles & failure of UKGov to honour international obligations #saferoutes
